data.title: The Ultimate Prince Playlist (slowest to fastest) [**UPDATED 500+ songs**]
data.text:
I started working on this playlist a couple of years ago and it has grown to include tracks from just about all of Prince’s released albums. I also included many of the popular vault tracks (for the file diggers) and protege albums. Since this is really a DJ's list, the tracks are listed from slowest BPM to highest. There also mixed based on key and musical style. Since it's a work in progress any track suggestions are appreciated.

2. God (Love Theme) [Purple Rain Deluxe] 58/C

mltijchr said:

this is VERY COOL 3rdEyeU..!

with many of my playlists, I try to set the songs from slowest to fastest

(& occasionally, from fastest to slowest)

but since I don't have a good/reliable BPM counter I just basically guess.

.

I will definitely use this reference to update my Prince-related playlists..!

Thanks for the thanks!! I'm still adding songs to it right now so it's definitely an ongoing project. I don't know if there are any other artists I could make a 400+ song playlist for!!
